title: Sapota Familyâ€™s activities
text:
As a solidarity family, not only keen on paying commensurating  income with work efficiency, offering opportunity to access new knowledge domains and new technologies nowadays, Sapota Family are also concerned about Joyness - Satisfaction of every member. 
 Therefore, Sapota made several changes in our working hours every Friday. So that Everyone can leave work at 5 pm to enjoy their weekends with their beloved-one sooner. In addition, Happy Hours for all of members in Weekdays are the main point making everyone always love working at Sapota.

title: The new office in the Da Nang branch
text:
Today, SapotaCorp family would like to announce that we've started the construction of a new office in Da Nang branch.
SapotaCorp's staff are extremely excited to move into a new office by the end of this year. With a spacious, top-notch facility, and professional working environment, we can't wait for new teammates to join this brand new home!

title: Awarded for excellent employees
text:
Criterion: "Attitude is better than Qualification" - As long as you have a good attitude, Sapota is ready to train you.
Thank you to the enthusiastic, hard-working staff who dedicate themselves to the company.
Thank you to domestic and foreign customers who always love and believe in Sapota's ability.
Congratulations on honoring excellent employees
